column2: I'm about to see my idol! So excited!
column4: I finally got to see you!
column5: It's you! I remember you from last show
column6: Yeah it's me!!! OMG you remember me!

column2: I'm wearing my best suit for today!
column4: This rose is my love for you!
column6: Well there's no discount in flower shop today…I'll buy more when next time they are on sale!
column7: You only buy flowers for me when it's on sale?!

column6: I stalked you last night! Did you forget?
Oh please forgive me, that's what we say in M87 planet

column2: I'm gonna tell my grandm—may she rest in peace—I saw you today!
column4: You've been my grandma's idol since she's a little kid!
column6: No I mean your spirit makes my grandma feel younger too!
column7: Well would you send her my regards?

column4: Run! There's gonna be a earthquake cause my love for you can shake the ground!
column5: okay then well should I run to?
column6: Come with me! I know a safe place!
column7: I don't feel good about this…

column2: I'm about to crack a big question!
column3: Ah, my headache is killing me
column4: Can you do me a favor?
column6: Can you do my homework for me?
column7: Eh I'm feeling dizzy today, please take my leave

column2: My offer is depending on this!
column3: That's a fan with good taste
column4: Can I come work for you?
column5: Well, what are you good at?
column7: Yeah I can do that too.

column4: How do you think of my singing?
column5: Yeah, good enough for a concert
column6: hehe I know you'll feel this way!
column7: As long as it cheers you…
